item.title: elasticsearch tips and tricks
item.description: elasticsearch list indexeshttps://www.google.co.id/search?q=elasticsearch+list+indexes<br />https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/1.4/_list_all_indexes.htmlcurl ‘localhost:9200/_cat/indices?v'elasticsearch installationhttps://github.com/Smile-SA/elasticsuite/wiki/ServerConfig-2.x<br />https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-install-java-with-apt-get-on-ubuntu-16-04elasticsearch configcluster.name: namaclusterbootstrap.memory_lock: true# http://devdocs.magento.com/guides/v2.1/config-guide/elasticsearch/es-overview.html#es-install-es<br />index.query.bool.max_clause_count: 102400# this must be set on non public ipnetwork.host: 127.0.0.1http.port: 9200# https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/2.4/modules-threadpool.html<br />processor: 2threadpool.bulk.queue_size: 4000# https://github.com/Smile-SA/elasticsuite/wiki/ServerConfig#configure-elasticsearch<br />script.inline: onscript.indexed: on
